# Resources

This directory contains CloudNestle resources (guides, checklists, templates, whitepapers, tools).

## Structure

-  - Resource markdown files with frontmatter
-  - Resource listing for dynamic page generation

## Frontmatter Format

```yaml
---
title: "Resource Title"
description: "Short description"
type: "Guide"
category: "AWS"
tags: ["tag1", "tag2"]
icon: "ðŸ“˜"
color: "#3B82F6"
publishedAt: "2026-02-17"
---
```

## Auto-generated

Resources are automatically committed by the social media automation system.
